channel.title: Ibrahim Abou Elenein
channel.description: Recent content on Ibrahim Abou Elenein

item.title: The Easiest Way Ever to Make Nice Presentaions
item.description: As a Linux user, we really love doing things from the terminal, we love to code, we hate GUI, We have no time to drag and drop as “muggles” I care about the technology. There are people who care about the user interface (UI); I can’t do UI to save my life. I mean if I was stranded on an island and the only way to get off that island was to make a pretty UI, I’d die there.

item.title: Why I Started Blogging
item.description: I would like to motivate my friends to blog, I will explain why. Documentation as a Way of Studying. One of the best ways to digest what you learn is to be able to articulate what you learned in your words and come up with takeaways. So, write a tutorial blog post or anything that will help you understand in-depth what you are learning and know it by heart. If You Really Want to Master Something, Teach It The person who learns the most in any classroom is the teacher.
